name: Dr. Ratio

traceMaterials.itemName: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

story: Member of the Intelligentsia Guild.Eccentric temperament, sharp-tongued but with an elegant demeanor.The face under the strange plaster head sculpture is apparently unexpectedly handsome.

skills.name: Mind is Might
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Intellectual Midwifery
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Syllogistic Paradox
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to a single target enemy and applies Wiseman's Folly. When Dr. Ratio's allies attack a target afflicted with Wiseman's Folly, Dr. Ratio launches 1 follow-up attack on this target.

skills.name: Cogito, Ergo Sum
skills.description: When using the Skill, there is a chance of launching a follow-up attack against the target for 1 time.

skills.name: Mold of Idolatry
skills.description: Creates a special dimension. Enemies within the dimension are Taunted. After entering battle with enemies in this dimension, there is a high chance to reduce SPD of enemy targets.

eidolons.name: Pride Comes Before a Fall
eidolons.description: The maximum stackable count for the Trace "Summation" increases by 4. When a battle begins, immediately obtains 4 stacks of Summation. Needs to unlock Summation first.

eidolons.name: The Divine Is in the Details
eidolons.description: When his Talent's follow-up attack hits a target, for every debuff the target has, additionally deals Imaginary Additional DMG equal to 20% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 4 time(s) during each follow-up attack.

eidolons.name: Know Thyself
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Ignorance Is Blight
eidolons.description: When triggering the Talent, additionally regenerates 15 Energy for Dr. Ratio.

eidolons.name: Sic Itur Ad Astra
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Vincit Omnia Veritas
eidolons.description: Increases the trigger count for Wiseman's Folly by 1. The DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack increases by 50%.
